title: Sataya Tis Tarn
overview: Pakin, a guy who is born in a wealthy family, is sent to live in America because Pakinee, his mother knows that he can remember his past life since he was 3 years old. She needs him to forget everything and sends him away, but his memories become clearer when he comes back.Pakin meets Rosawan when he comes back to Thailand. She has the same face as the girl he's always dreamed of. He tries to get close to her to find out if she's the same person.
